headline: Is There Now An Opportunity In McCormick (MKC) After Multi‑Year Share Price Declines
summary: If you are wondering whether McCormick’s current share price really reflects its long term potential, it helps to step back and look at what the recent numbers are telling you about value. The stock last closed at US$67.04, with returns of a 1% decline over 7 days, 2.2% decline over 30 days, a 0.4% decline year to date, 6.2% decline over 1 year and 7.2% decline over 3 years, and a 19.1% decline over 5 years, which may affect how you think about both opportunity and risk. Recent coverage has...
